settings.mfaEnabled: 2FA is enabled. Your account is protected.
settings.mfaDisabled: 2FA is disabled. Enable it for extra security.

users.title: User Management
users.subtitle: Manage users and their access
users.confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete user
users.usernameHelp: Letters, numbers, underscores and dots only
users.roleDescUser: Can only access helpdesk features (tickets, knowledge base)
users.roleDescTech: Can access features based on assigned permissions
users.roleDescAdmin: Full access except scripts and system settings
users.roleDescSuperadmin: Full access to all features including scripts and system settings

validation.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.usernameInvalidChars: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and dots
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

unauthorized.title: Access Denied
unauthorized.subtitle: You don't have permission to access this page
unauthorized.message: Please contact your administrator if you believe this is an error.

inventory.title: Inventory
inventory.hierarchyLevelHint: Determines position in topology view (0 = top, higher = lower)
inventory.confirmBulkDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {count} equipment?

dcim.selectRackToView: Select a rack to view its layout

contracts.title: Contracts
contracts.noLinkedContracts: No contracts linked to this equipment
contracts.noEquipmentLinked: No equipment linked to this contract

tickets.title: Tickets
tickets.noTicketsDesc: Create your first ticket to get started
tickets.resolutionPlaceholder: Describe how the issue was resolved...
tickets.noOpenTickets: No open tickets for this equipment
tickets.startConversation: Start the conversation by adding a message
tickets.closeInfo: Closing this ticket will mark it as complete. You can reopen it later if needed.
tickets.closeNotePlaceholder: Add any final notes about why this ticket is being closed...
tickets.replyClosed: This ticket is closed. Reopen it to add a reply.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.enableModeDesc: Show maintenance message and restrict access to administrators only

email.title: Email Integration
email.m365Instructions: To connect Microsoft 365, you need to create an App Registration in Azure AD with Mail.Read, Mail.Send, and Mail.ReadWrite application permissions.
email.mailboxHint: Enter the shared mailbox email address (e.g., support@company.com)
email.confirmDeleteConfig: Are you sure you want to delete this email configuration?
email.m365SetupHint: You need to create an App Registration in Azure AD with Mail.Read, Mail.Send, and Mail.ReadWrite permissions.
email.m365UserAccountHint: Enter a user account that has access to the shared mailbox you want to use.
email.m365InboundFolderHint: Select the folder to monitor for incoming emails that will create tickets.
email.inboundFolderHint: Select the folder to monitor for incoming emails that will create tickets.
email.connectAccountFirst: Connect an email account to select a folder.
email.m365CredentialsRequired: Please fill in Tenant ID, Client ID and Client Secret first
email.noMailboxesFound: No mailboxes found for this account
email.fetchMailboxesFailed: Failed to fetch mailboxes from Microsoft 365
email.noFoldersFound: No folders found in this mailbox
email.fetchFoldersFailed: Failed to fetch folders from Microsoft 365
email.outboundNotificationsDesc: Configure which ticket events trigger email notifications
email.notifyTicketCreatedDesc: Send notification when a new ticket is created
email.notifyTicketAssignedDesc: Send notification when a ticket is assigned to someone
email.notifyCommentAddedDesc: Send notification when a public comment is added
email.notifyTicketResolvedDesc: Send notification when a ticket is resolved
email.notifySlaWarningDesc: Send warning when SLA is 80% elapsed
email.notifySlaBreachDesc: Send alert when SLA has been breached
email.inboundEmailDesc: Create tickets automatically from incoming emails
email.enableInboundDesc: Automatically create tickets from incoming emails
email.allowedDomainsPlaceholder: Leave empty to allow all domains
email.subject: Subject

inboundSettings.title: Inbound Email Settings
inboundSettings.allowedDomainsHint: Comma-separated list. Leave empty to allow all.

sla.title: SLA Policies
sla.policiesDesc: Define SLA response and resolution times by priority level
sla.slaTimesDesc: Response time = first reply; Resolution time = ticket closed
sla.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this SLA policy?

topology.title: Network Topology
topology.selectNodeHint: Click on a node to view details
topology.noDataDescription: No topology data available. Add subnets, IPs or equipment to visualize the network.
topology.linkModeInstructions: Click on an equipment to select it as source, then click on another to create a link.
topology.confirmDeleteLink: Are you sure you want to delete the link between {source} and {target}?
topology.linkExists: A link already exists between these equipment
topology.pathfindingHint: Select two nodes to calculate the shortest path
topology.noPathFound: No path found between these nodes
topology.loopDetected: Creating this link would create a network loop!
topology.dragToConnect: Drag from a node to connect
topology.releaseToConnect: Release to connect to this node

bulk.title: Bulk Actions
bulk.selectActionAbove: Select an action to apply to all selected items
bulk.changeStatusDesc: Update the status of all selected items
bulk.changeLocationDesc: Move all selected items to a different location
bulk.changePriorityDesc: Update the priority of all selected items
bulk.changeTypeDesc: Update the type of all selected items
bulk.assignToDesc: Assign all selected items to a user
bulk.releaseItemsDesc: Release all selected items (set to available)
bulk.exportToCsvDesc: Export selected items to Excel or CSV file
